mng: plum, plum flower, Japanese apricot (Prunus mume)

exm.mng: Yangmei town in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
red bayberry, Chinese bayberry, Japanese bayberry, Myrica rubra
Huangmei county in Huanggang 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei
Jinpingmei or the Golden Lotus (1617), Ming dynasty vernacular novel, formerly notorious and banned for its sexual content
lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom), fig. innocent children's games, childhood sweethearts, a couple who grew up as childhood friends
